header.title: lname

erlref.modulesummary: Interface that supports the name pseudo-objects.

description.p: This interface is a part of the names library which is used to hide the representation of names. In Orbers Erlang mapping the pseudo-object names and the real IDL names have the same representation but it is desirable that the clients uses the names library so they will not be dependent of the representation. The lname interface supports handling of names e.g. adding and removing name components.

Note that the lname interface in orber does not contain a destroy function because the Names are represented as standard Erlang lists and therefor will be removed by the garbage collector when not in use.

desc.p: This function returns a new name.

func.name: insert_component(Name, N, NameComponent) -> Return
func.fsummary: Insert a new name component in a name

desc.p: This function returns a name where the new name component has been inserted as component N in Name.

func.name: get_component(Name, N) -> Return
func.fsummary: Get a name component from a name

desc.p: This function returns the N:th name component in Name.

func.name: delete_component(Name, N) -> Return
func.fsummary: Delete a name component from a name

desc.p: This function deletes the N:th name component from Name and returns the new name.

func.name: num_component(Name) -> Return
func.fsummary: Count the number of name components in a name

desc.p: This function returns a the number of name components in Name.

func.name: equal(Name1, Name2) -> Return
func.fsummary: Test if two names are equal

desc.p: This function returns true if the two names are equal and false otherwise.

func.name: less_than(Name1, Name2) -> Return
func.fsummary: Test if one name is lesser than the other

desc.p: This function returns true if Name1 are lesser than Name2 and false otherwise.

func.name: to_idl_form(Name) -> Return
func.fsummary: Transform a pseudo name to an IDL name

desc.p: This function just checks if Name is a correct IDL name before returning it because the name representation is the same for pseudo and IDL names in orber.

func.name: from_idl_form(Name) -> Return
func.fsummary: Transform an IDL name to a pseudo name

desc.p: This function just returns the Name because the name representation is the same for pseudo and IDL names in orber.
